embeds.title: ** COMMAND HELP**
embeds.description:
```asciidoc
= Hostile / Armada command =

Summary or detailed hostile or armada information

Command ::
!hostile / !armada

Aliases ::
!hos, !npc / !arm
```

fields.name: Syntax:
fields.value:
```asciidoc
!command <name> <filters> <min> <condition> <max> <sort>

Command ::
 * hostile  - hostile search
 * armada   - armada search

Name ::
 * Full/partial Hostile or armada name
 * enclose in quotes for explicit name search

Filters ::
 * Faction  - Neutral, Fed, Rom, Kln, Aug
              Swarm, Borg, Eclipse, Rogue
 * Hostile  - Interceptor, Explorer, Battleship
              Survey
 * Armada   - Uncommon, Rare, Epic
 * Info     - summary list/detailed stats/info
 * Rank     - Ranked summary stats/info
 * fp       - Ship weapons (firing pattern)
 * Other    - Elite, Hub, Mission, Planet, Warp,
              Power, Reputation, Dark, Deep, Origin
 * FAQ      - Armada frequently Asked Questions

Min/Max ::
 * Numeric filter range
   - level (default)
   - hostile/armada strength/power/rep

Condition ::
 * applied to range: `+`, `=`, `-`, `<`, `>`,
                     `<=`, `>=`
   - only applies to the first range value

 Sort ::
  * `!` sort by Name

```

fields.name: Usage Examples:
fields.value:
```asciidoc
Hostiles ::
!hostile 31              = level 31 hostiles sys view
!hostile 31 info         = level 31 hostiles info view
!host bs 33              = level 33 battleship hostiles
!npc scout 31            = level 31 scouts
!npc fed "scout *" 31    = level 31 fed scouts
!npc fed "scout *" 31 fp = firing pattern
!npc fed "scout *" fp    = all fed scout by level
!npc "Pakled Thief" info = summary of all hostile type
!npc "Pakled Thief" rank = level ranked best to worst

Armadas ::
!armada citadel 36 info  = Romulan Citadel 36 info card
!armada epic fed hubs    = Fed hub systems epic armada
!armada epic fed 33 info = armada stats and information
!armada Origin           = Origin space armada list
!armada faq              = detailed armada information
!borgmadas               = list all Borg armadas
!muddmadas               = list all Outlaw armadas
!anomadas                = list all Anomaly armadas
!terrimadas              = list all Origin Sector armadas
```

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
```
 * Faction name: neu fed kli rom aug swarm, borg, ecl, rog
 * Hostile types: hos, int, exp, bshp, sur
 * Armada types: unc, rar, epi
 * Rank by Power, Level, or Reputation

```

embeds.title: ** COMMAND HELP**
embeds.description:
```asciidoc
= ship command =

Ship upgrade/repair cost & time by component/tier, total cost of ownership, warp/impulse range/speed, blueprints, firing patterns, capacity & protected cargo, crew slots, and scrapping

Command ::
!ship

Aliases ::
!shp, !sh, !bird
```

fields.name: Syntax:
fields.value:
```asciidoc
!ship <name> <mode> <filters> <sort>
!<name> <mode> <filters> <sort>

Name ::
 * Full/partial/nickname ship name

Mode ::
 * blueprint - cost & where
 * cargo     - protected/capacity by tier
 * crewslots - # of crew by level
 * crewstats - crew stat bonus
 * firingpattern - ship weapon firing pattern (fp)
 * stats   - ship statistics
 * info    - Tier + component
 * levels  - XP by tier
 * repair  - cost by tier
 * scrap   - requires level and tier
 * warp    - warp/impulse range/speed by tier
 * cost    - search in field
 * list    - compact list of ship by
               faction/type/rarity/grade

Filters ::
 * tier    - ship or Component tier/mk
 * faction - neutral, federation, romulan, klingon
 * grade   - G1 to G4 / 1* to 4*
 * rarity  - common, uncommon, rare, epic
 * tco     - total cost of ownership
 * type    - interceptor, explorer, battleship,
               survey
Sort ::
 * byFaction, byGrade, byRarity, byType
```

fields.name: Usage Examples:
fields.value:
```asciidoc
!ship byfaction     = list sorted by faction
!ship list          = compact list of all ships
!ship list byRarity = list sorted by rarity
!ship g4            = all G4 ships
!ship fed           = all federation ships
!envoy T5           = ECS Envoy Tier 5 total costs
!bortas T5 T9       = Bortas total cost Tiers 5 to 9
!cent T5 warp       = Centurion MK5 warp engine cost
!cent lvls          = XP by level - all tiers
!pizza cutter repair  = Saladin repair cost/tier
!mf warp            = Mayflower Warp and impulse
!scrap list         = list of scrappable ships
!scrap fed 3*       = Fed 3* recyclable ships
!intrepid scrap T9 45 = Recycle Lvl 45 ship, T9
           components reward Resources + base time
!augur stats        = Augur T1 stats sunmmary
!augur stats t7     = Augur T7 stats summary
!augur stats t7 36  = Ops 36 specific details
!ship cost          = list of all cost resources
!4* rare ship "rare ore" cost
    = list by "rare ore" costs for Rare G4 ships

```

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
```
 * Part/Components: armor, cargo, impulse engine,
                    mining laser, shield, warp
                    engine, weapon, energy, kinetic
 * Total per tier: All Components + Tier upgrade
    eg: T5 = upgrade all MK4 to MK5 + tier 5

 ** For Skins and Projectiles, see !refit help
```
